description.zh-cn: 汉朝第五位皇帝，与其子汉景帝共同开创“文景之治”。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Han dynasty, who, along with his son Emperor Jing, initiated the Rule of Wen and Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的嫔妃，汉文帝刘恒的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang) and the birth mother of Emperor Wen of Han (Liu Heng).

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第六位皇帝，汉文帝之子。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Han dynasty, son of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第二位皇帝，汉高祖刘邦与吕后之子。
description.en: The second emperor of the Han dynasty, son of Liu Bang and Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第四位皇帝，为汉文帝前任，在诛吕政变后被废黜并杀害。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, predecessor of Emperor Wen, who was deposed and killed after the Lü Clan Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，汉惠帝之母。刘邦去世后临朝称制。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang) and mother of Emperor Hui. She ruled as regent after Liu Bang's death.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的宠妃，赵王刘如意之母，被吕后所害。
description.en: A favored consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang), mother of Liu Ruyi, Prince of Zhao. Killed by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦与戚夫人之子，赵王，被吕后所害。
description.en: Son of Liu Bang and Consort Qi, Prince of Zhao. Killed by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 汉初功臣，与陈平等人发动诛吕安刘政变，拥立汉文帝。
description.en: A meritorious official of the early Han dynasty who, along with Chen Ping, launched a coup against the Lü clan and enthroned Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 汉初功臣，与周勃等人发动诛吕安刘政变，拥立汉文帝。
description.en: A meritorious official of the early Han dynasty who, along with Zhou Bo, launched a coup against the Lü clan and enthroned Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 齐王，汉高祖刘邦长孙，首先起兵反抗吕氏集团。
description.en: King of Qi, the eldest grandson of Emperor Gaozu Liu Bang, who was the first to rise against the Lü clan.

description.zh-cn: 吕后死后，汉初功臣与刘氏皇族联合铲除吕氏外戚集团的政治事件。
description.en: A political event after Empress Lü's death, where meritorious officials and the Liu imperial clan jointly eliminated the Lü consort kin clan.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝异母弟，淮南王。后因谋反被废，在流放途中绝食而死。
description.en: Half-brother of Emperor Wen, King of Huainan. He was later deposed for treason and starved himself to death during exile.

description.zh-cn: 济北王，汉文帝时期起兵反叛，兵败自杀。
description.en: King of Jibei, who rebelled during Emperor Wen's reign and committed suicide after being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 西汉汉文帝和汉景帝统治时期出现的政治安定、经济发展的盛世。
description.en: A golden age of political stability and economic prosperity during the reigns of Emperor Wen and Emperor Jing of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 古代北亚的游牧民族，汉朝初期的主要外部威胁。
description.en: An ancient nomadic people of North Asia, the main external threat to the early Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 原为汉朝宦官，后投降匈奴，成为单于的谋士，对汉朝构成威胁。
description.en: Originally a Han court eunuch who later defected to the Xiongnu, became an advisor to the Chanyu, and posed a threat to the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南越国创建者，曾在吕后时期称帝，后在汉文帝时期去除帝号，向汉朝称臣。
description.en: Founder of the Nanyue kingdom, who declared himself emperor during Empress Lü's time but later renounced the title and submitted to the Han dynasty during Emperor Wen's reign.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国南部的割据政权，由赵佗建立。
description.en: A separatist regime located in southern China, founded by Zhao Tuo.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的宠臣，后被汉景帝清算，穷困饿死。
description.en: A favored courtier of Emperor Wen, who was later purged by Emperor Jing and died in poverty.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的皇后，汉景帝的母亲。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Wen and mother of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝与窦皇后之女。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Wen and Empress Dou.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝与窦皇后之子，封为梁孝王。
description.en: Son of Emperor Wen and Empress Dou, enfeoffed as Prince Xiao of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝为代王时的正妻，早逝，其四子也均早夭。
description.en: The principal wife of Emperor Wen when he was the King of Dai. She died early, and their four sons also died young.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的朝代，分为西汉和东汉。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, divided into the Western Han and Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第四子
description.en: Fourth son of Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 薄太后之子
description.en: Son of Empress Dowager Bo.

description.zh-cn: 汉惠帝之庶弟
description.en: Half-brother of Emperor Hui of Han.

description.zh-cn: 异母兄弟
description.en: Half-brothers

description.zh-cn: 刘恒为代王时的王后
description.en: Queen when Liu Heng was the King of Dai.

description.zh-cn: 吕后杀害了戚夫人。
description.en: Empress Lü had Consort Qi killed.

description.zh-cn: 吕后杀害了刘如意。
description.en: Empress Lü had Liu Ruyi killed.

description.zh-cn: 诛吕安刘事件后，功臣集团选择并拥立代王刘恒为帝。
description.en: After the Purge of the Lü Clan, the meritorious officials selected and enthroned Liu Heng, the King of Dai, as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 作为功臣集团首领，拥立汉文帝即位。
description.en: As a leader of the meritorious officials, he supported the enthronement of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 作为功臣集团首领，拥立汉文帝即位。
description.en: As a leader of the meritorious officials, he supported the enthronement of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 首先起兵反抗吕氏，引发了诛吕安刘事件。
description.en: He was the first to raise arms against the Lü clan, triggering the Purge of the Lü Clan.

description.zh-cn: 事件后，后少帝刘弘被废黜并杀害。
description.en: After the event, the Later Emperor Shao (Liu Hong) was deposed and killed.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的统治开启了文景之治。
description.en: The reign of Emperor Wen initiated the Rule of Wen and Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝继承并发展了其父的政策，共同构成了文景之治。
description.en: Emperor Jing continued and developed his father's policies, jointly creating the Rule of Wen and Jing.

description.zh-cn: 刘兴居趁汉文帝亲征匈奴时起兵反叛。
description.en: Liu Xingju rebelled while Emperor Wen was personally leading a campaign against the Xiongnu.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝派兵平定了刘兴居的叛乱，刘兴居兵败自杀。
description.en: Emperor Wen dispatched troops to suppress Liu Xingju's rebellion, who then committed suicide after being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 淮南王刘长意图谋反。
description.en: Liu Chang, the King of Huainan, plotted a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝发觉其谋反，将其逮捕并流放，刘长在途中绝食而亡。
description.en: Emperor Wen discovered his plot, arrested and exiled him; Liu Chang starved himself to death en route.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝在位期间，匈奴多次大规模入侵汉朝边境。
description.en: During Emperor Wen's reign, the Xiongnu launched multiple large-scale invasions of the Han border.

description.zh-cn: 中行说投降匈奴后，为匈奴出谋划策，成为汉朝的祸患。
description.en: After defecting to the Xiongnu, Zhonghang Shuo advised them and became a menace to the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南越王赵佗在汉文帝时期去除帝号，向汉朝称臣。
description.en: Zhao Tuo, the king of Nanyue, renounced his imperial title and submitted to the Han dynasty during Emperor Wen's reign.

description.zh-cn: 邓通是汉文帝的宠臣。
description.en: Deng Tong was a favored courtier of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 邓通曾得罪过当时还是太子的刘启（后来的汉景帝）。
description.en: Deng Tong had offended Liu Qi (the future Emperor Jing) when he was still the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝即位后，罢免了邓通并没收其家产，导致其穷困饿死。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Jing dismissed Deng Tong and confiscated his property, leading to his death from starvation.
